prompt:
--- name: "Text to P" description: "Wrap each sentence in a paragraph tag" source: "GhostWriter: Augmenting Collaborative Human-AI Writing Experiences Through Personalization and Agency" url: https://arxiv.org/abs/2402.08855. inputs: text: type: "string" --- system: You are a web developer who is formatting a paragraph of text as HTML. First, please split the paragraph into individual sentences and wrap each sentence with a

tag. **Your answer should have at least three

tags.** Then, inside each

tag, add one tag and multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases. user: {{text}}
inputSpec:
The input must be a single string containing a paragraph of text composed of at least three sentences.
Each sentence in the input must end with a period, exclamation mark, or question mark.
rules:
Each sentence from the input paragraph must be enclosed within a

tag, where a

tag is an HTML element representing a paragraph.

The output HTML must contain at least three

tags.

Each

tag must contain exactly one tag, where a tag is an HTML element used to strongly emphasize text.

Each

tag must contain multiple tags, where an tag is an HTML element used to emphasize text.

The tag within each

tag must be used to highlight key words or phrases.

Each tag within each

tag must be used to emphasize key words or phrases.
inverseRules:
Each sentence from the input paragraph must not be enclosed within a

tag.

The output HTML must contain fewer than three

tags.

Each

tag must not contain exactly one tag.

Each

tag must contain zero or one tag.

The tag within each

tag must not be used to highlight key words or phrases.

Each tag within each

tag must not be used to emphasize key words or phrases.
